Sentencas: In recent years, research efforts on fuel cells have been addressed on the development of multifuel reformers with particular emphasis toward the potential use of non-traditional fuels.
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application

Sentencas: Among these, biogas is considered very promising to be used as syngas source for fuel cell system applications.
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application

Sentencas: The interest on this hydrogen source is focused mainly to supply high temperature fuel cells (HTFC).
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application

Sentencas: This paper reports a wide experimental research investigation on SOFC device supplied by syngas produced with different biogas reforming processes (steam reforming, autothermal reforming and partial oxidation).
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application

Sentencas: Thermodynamic simulations have been performed to determine the reformed gas composition varying process, reaction temperature and steam to carbon - oxygen to carbon ratios.
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application

Sentencas: Syngas mixtures obtained were experimentally tested in order to evaluate the performance of a SOFC mono-cell.
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application

Sentencas: Furthermore, an analysis of the combination: fuel processor with a SOFC stack has been determined in order to assess the total energy efficiency.
Titulo: Biogas reforming process investigation for SOFC application
